page.title: 20MUTHILL SCHOOL, CREDITS.
page.content: The following pupils took part in the Domesday Project-Mary Campbell, Fiona Drysdale, Fiona McGregor,Coreen Melville,Catherine Watson,Kathrine Bell, Heather Mitchell,Susan Ellis, Kate Farquhar, Hilary Teale. John McCulloch,Scott MacGregor,Alex. Fowler,Scott Campbell,Graham Rennie, Pearson Whyte,Colin Cameron, Stuart Insch,Sam Monie, David Sinclair. Thanks are due to Mr S.Macintosh, Rev. S.Strachan, Mr Gibson for coming in to talk to the pupils. Staff- Mrs E.M.Holland,Miss M.Anderson gave valuable assistance in assembly of text pages. To all the farmers who gave of their time so freely to talk to the pupils and explain land cover we express our thanks, and also to all the mothers who provided transport for the visits outwith the village.Thanks also to Richard Holland(photographs).
